module.name: googleSpeech
module.description: This module is responsible for recognizing speech in various languages.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This module retrieves raw input from the microphone port and queries google cloud speech services and provides the transcript on a port.

param.desc: Module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name.
Use 16000 hertz for the sample rate

input.description: Port to receive sound from the microphone

output.description: Sends the transcript result of the output of google
Sends commands to the microphone device driver to start and stop the acquisition.
